bs4Dash Showcase

David Granjon

2018-11-07

Source: vignettes/bs4Showcase.Rmd
bs4Showcase.Rmd

Dashboard Demo

The demo is hosted here or here. From RStudio, you can also launch the gallery as follows:

library(shiny)
library(shinyWidgets)
library(bs4Dash)
library(plotly)

bs4DashGallery()
